title: Assign Task to a Crew
description: A foreman needs to formally assign the 'Install 1st Floor Windows' task to their crew in the task management system.

tasks.description: Select the 'Install 1st Floor Windows' task from the work breakdown structure.
Assign the task to 'Crew B' and set the status to 'In Progress'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task is successfully assigned and its status updated.
